Topic.Title: Tax increase will not affect 98% of people and investors

Message.Msg: the ssa and medicare should never have been temporarily reduced. Take that stupid tax cut and Bush's tax cut that pulled money out of the social secuirty fund to finance his tax cut, is a sure sign that both parties want to bankrupt ssa. Talk about social unrest in the making. All these baby boomers worked their lifetime expecting ssa.
